titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the The Log of the Stanford Voyage to the North Pole, July 5-22, 1992
The Log of the Stanford Voyage to the North Pole, July 5-22, 1992

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: The Log of the Stanford Voyage to the North Pole, July 5-22, 1992
did.abstract: Daily log of the 1992 Stanford Alumni Association Travel/Study Program Voyage to the North Pole on board the Sovetsiky Soyuz. Includes illustrations and maps.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred from the Stephen Henry Schneider papers, SC0153 in February 2014.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [identification of item], The Log of the Stanford Voyage to the North Pole, July 5-22, 1992 (SCM0432). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: Stanford Travel/Study provides Stanford alumni, friends, and family with educational travel journeys to more than 80 countries each year. The North Pole Voyage was held aboard the Sovetskiy Soyuz.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Daily log of the 1992 Stanford Alumni Association Travel/Study Program Voyage to the North Pole on board the Sovetsiky Soyuz. Includes illustrations and maps.

did.unittitle: The Log of the Stanford Voyage to the North Pole, July 5-22, 1992 (Second edition, Revised)
